summary: An ordinance providing for the improvement of the alley in block 36, Bell & Denny's 2nd Addition to the City of Seattle; being the alley between 3rd Avenue and 4th Avenue, extending from Battery Street to Bell Street; by paving the same, all in accordance with Majority Petition No. 88191, of the City Council of the City of Seattle, creating a local improvement district thereof, and providing that payment for said improvement shall be made by special assessments upon property in said district payable by the mode of "Payment in Bonds."
